item.title: Nvidia reportedly facing China antitrust probe. Why that matters for the stock.
item.description: Nvidia’s stock heads for a third-straight decline after report of China’s investigation due to antitrust concerns.

item.title: AppLovin’s S&P 500 snub could make for the stock’s worst day in two years
item.description: AppLovin’s $135 billion market cap and 900% year-to-date surge through Friday’s close weren’t enough to earn it entry into the benchmark large-cap ind...

item.title: Why the case against a Roth conversion gets stronger if Trump’s tax cuts continue
item.description: Break-even point for a Roth conversion is long —and extending the 2017 tax cuts could make it longer.

item.title: U.S. Stocks Fall as China Probes Nvidia
item.description: U.S. stocks were slipping to start the week, with Nvidia under particular pressure after China announced an antitrust probe into the chip giant.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise as China Central Bank Bullion Holdings Grow
item.description: Gold futures rise as China’s central bank resumes bullion purchases after a six-month hiatus.
